option.name: content
option.value: Focus on created classes and interfaces because they provide a better understanding of the commit. Then you can look at existing classes modifications. Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Start with a short sentence in imperative form, no more than 50 characters long. Then leave an empty line and continue with a more detailed explanation. Write only one sentence for the first part, and two or three sentences at most for the detailed explanation.

list.name: LEA-35 Studying and Assessment
list.comment:
Refactor: improve Study and Dashboard view logic
Introduced `StudyAction` and `StudyUIState` and modified `StudyViewModel` and `StudyScreen` to enhance separation of concerns. Added `DashboardViewModel` and `DashboardScreen` implementations with corresponding unit tests to support dashboard functionality. Updated snackbar message handling to use external resource files for better localization and maintainability.

list.name: Changes
list.comment: - Implemented `DashboardViewModel` with necessary dependencies and logic. - Created `DashboardScreen` to display the dashboard UI. - Added comprehensive unit tests for `DashboardViewModel` to ensure functionality.

list.name: LEA-15 User Sign Up and Sign In (Firebase Auth)
list.comment:
Remove unused configuration and obsolete import.
Deleted unnecessary debug run configurations from IntelliJ's deploymentTargetSelector.xml. Also removed an unused Kotlin Android source set import from composeApp/build.gradle.kts to clean up the project setup.

list.name: LEA-16 Forgot Password Feature
list.comment:
Upgrade Firebase BOM to version 33.5.0
This update ensures compatibility with the latest Firebase features and security enhancements. The change affects only the firebase-bom dependency, updating it from version 33.4.0 to 33.5.0.

list.name: LEA-17 Profile Creation
list.comment:
Remove outdated project enhancements section
Removed the section listing old project enhancements from the README. This simplifies the documentation by focusing on relevant information and avoids redundancy.

task.summary: Default task
Profile Creation

Add style questionnaire and learning style features
Introduced classes and interfaces for the style questionnaire and learning style results in create profile flow. Enhanced CreateUserProfileViewModel with new methods to handle style-related functionalities and updated tests and state management.

Refactor assistant services and improve error handling
Updated `StyleBreakdown` to make its properties non-nullable. Refactored `StyleQuizServiceImpl` to use `AIAssistantClient` and added `isRunActive` method for run status checking. Improved `Tool` serialization and error handling in `OpenAIAssistantClient` by supporting detailed error containers.

Add new layout and form components for profile creation
Introduced AlignedLabeledBarsLayout and PersonalInfoForm composables for create profile flow. Updated CreateProfileUIState with new properties and enhanced viewModel with appropriate handling and state management.

Remove outdated project enhancements section
Removed the section listing old project enhancements from the README. This simplifies the documentation by focusing on relevant information and avoids redundancy.
Learning Progress Visualization

Add Room database dependencies and update AGP version
Integrated Room dependencies for runtime, ktx, and testing in the project. Updated the Android Gradle Plugin (AGP) version to 8.7.0-rc01 and other related library versions in the libs.versions.toml file. Added run configuration settings to .idea folder.

Create database migration and init classes
Added `DatabaseProvider` and `DatabaseMigration` classes to support database initialization and migrations on Android and desktop platforms. Removed `SharedViewModel` and related classes to focus on separating database-related functionality. Updated Firebase-related services to a new package structure for better organization.

Create database migration and init classes
Added `DatabaseProvider` and `DatabaseMigration` classes to support database initialization and migrations on Android and desktop platforms. Removed `SharedViewModel` and related classes to focus on separating database-related functionality. Updated Firebase-related services to a new package structure for better organization.

Add Room updates and database driver for desktop
Configured bundled SQLite driver for the desktop in DatabaseProvider. Enhanced build script with Room compiler dependencies for both common metadata and desktop environments.

Refactor data sources and repository structure.
Introduce `LearningStyleRepository` and `StyleConverter` classes, and refactor remote and local data sources. Removed obsolete interfaces and enhanced test coverage for learning styles.

Add new TestTags and remove unused ones
Removed the unused PERSONAL_INFO_PICKER tag from the TestTags enumeration. Also cleaned up unnecessary import in User.kt to improve code readability.

Refactor style questionnaire handling and rename services
Replaced `StyleQuestionnaire` with a list of `StyleQuestion` and adjusted related usage across the codebase. Renamed `AuthService` and `StorageService` to `AuthClient` and `StorageClient`, respectively, to reflect the new naming convention. Updated the `GetStyleQuestionnaireUseCase` to stream questions from the `StyleQuizClient`.

Refactor OpenAIAssistantClient and remove SharedState
Deleted the SharedState data class from the presentation layer to streamline state management. Refactored OpenAIAssistantClientTest to add tests for the newly implemented cancelRun functionality and updated URLs for the submitToolOutput method. Minor cleanup in CreateProfileScreen for better readability.

Remove LearningStyle-related data and sync classes and tests
This commit deletes multiple classes and interfaces related to LearningStyle functionality, including local entities, DAOs, remote data sources, repositories, and their respective tests. This cleanup appears to be part of a larger refactor or deprecation of the LearningStyle feature.

Refactor domain models and add Curriculum structure
Replaced `StyleResult` with `LearningStyle` across multiple files for better naming clarity. Created new `Lesson`, `Section`, and `Module` models, along with `CurriculumStatus` enum to support a detailed curriculum structure. Removed obsolete use cases and tests related to user styles.

Add new entity classes and make domain models open
Introduced new entity classes for Curriculum, Module, Lesson, and Section to represent local database tables. Updated corresponding domain models to be open for inheritance, allowing more flexibility in data representation.

Add new DAOs for curriculum, module, lesson, section, and image cache
Created CurriculumDao, ModuleDao, LessonDao, SectionDao, and CachedImageDao to handle database operations for their respective entities. Added support for these DAOs in LearnFlexDatabase and adjusted RepositoryImpl and other related classes. Enhanced entity models with image URL attributes.

Refactor and enhance save state handling in CreateProfileScreen
Replace remember with rememberSaveable for better state persistence. Introduce Saver for Style enum in CreateProfileScreen to ensure state restoration.

Refactor user data update to separate username and photo URL
Created separate methods for updating username and photo URL in AuthClient and FirebaseAuthService. Modified related use cases and tests to use these new methods, enhancing clarity and maintainability.

Add Coil image loading library
Integrated Coil for image loading and added its dependencies to the build files. Updated database version to 4 and made necessary version adjustments for dependencies in the libs.versions.toml file.

Remove CachedImageDao and CachedImageEntity classes
Deleted CachedImageDao and CachedImageEntity, and removed references to them from LearnFlexDatabase. Updated database version to 5 to reflect these changes. Added new XML configurations for App Insights and Firebase.

Refactor storage and auth services and update DAOs
Renamed Firebase services to Client for clarity and enhanced naming consistency. Added `get` queries to SectionDao, CurriculumDao, LessonDao, and ModuleDao. Expanded DatabaseTest with more test coverage for new and existing DAOs and entities.

Add GoogleImageSearchClientTest and refactor client packages
Refactored the package structure for client-related classes from "service" to "client". Added `GoogleImageSearchClientTest` to improve test coverage for image search functionalities. Enhanced error handling in BaseViewModel by distinguishing `ApiError`.

Add new Session entity and expand Route options
Introduced a new `Session` entity for tracking learning sessions and extended the `Route` options for navigation. Additionally, created a utility for progress color calculation, added several UI components like `CustomScaffold`, and updated existing layouts and resources for enhanced navigation and display capabilities.

Refactor components and add documentation comments
Introduce new classes with enhanced functionalities, including CustomLazyListVerticalScrollbar and refactored components like CustomCircularProgressIndicator. Add detailed documentation comments in Session and SessionEntity classes for better clarification. Additionally, improve UI interactions by allowing hover effects and displaying progress values dynamically in graphical elements.

Add path parameter to sync operations and use cases
Introduces a `PathBuilder` interface and integrates it into `CreateUserProfileUseCase`. Updates `Repository` and sync-related components to require a path during operations, facilitating more precise data manipulation in remote data sources. Also refactors tests and components, like `CustomScaffold`, to accommodate these changes.

Refactor data layer by replacing data source with DAO interfaces.
Replaced the RemoteDataSource interface with a RemoteDao interface, focusing on CRUD operations. Removed RepositoryImpl and its associated test class, reorganizing responsibility to new DAO classes. Updated FirestorePathConstructor with detailed documentation and refactored related tests to align with the new data access architecture.

Add Lesson-related use cases and repository integration
Introduce various use cases for managing lesson entities, such as upload, update, delete, and retrieval based on different criteria. Additionally, integrate the LessonRepository with the necessary CRUD and query operations, update dependency injections, and include corresponding tests.

Add use cases and tests for Module operations
Introduce classes for Module operations including GetModule, UploadModule, UpdateModule, DeleteAllModules, and GetModuleIdsByMinQuizScore. Implement corresponding tests for each use case to verify success and failure scenarios. Additionally, configure ModuleRepository in dependency injection to support CRUD and query operations using new use cases.

Add WindowWidthSizeClass to CustomScaffold and modular use cases
Integrate `WindowWidthSizeClass` into the `CustomScaffold` function to adapt the UI layout based on device screen size. Additionally, introduce new module-related use cases for handling CRUD operations efficiently. This update also includes the addition of a small logo size in the `Dimension` class and version update for the database schema.

Implement Firestore path builder and section session utilities
The FirestorePathBuilder class has been expanded to include path-building functionality for multiple Firestore collections and documents like users, curriculums, modules, lessons, sections, and sessions, implementing the PathBuilder interface. New test cases for several use cases involving sections and sessions have been added, along with updates to data models, repository configurations, and sync managers to accommodate sections and sessions within the module's DI setup.

Remove IDE-specific config files from repository
This commit deletes several IntelliJ IDEA configuration files such as `.gitignore`, `androidTestResultsUserPreferences.xml`, and other related settings files. Their removal ensures that local development settings do not conflict across different environments and reduces repository clutter.
Automated Content Creation Workflow

Remove unused domain models and constants.
Deleted obsolete classes such as `LearningPreferences`, `LearningStyle`, and `StyleQuestionnaire` from the domain model. Replaced their functionality with `Profile` and `StyleQuizGenerator` to streamline the design. Updated related use cases and UI components to align with these changes.

Refactor assistant generator architecture and dependencies
Added and updated assistant generator clients with enhanced modularity and renamed key classes (e.g., StyleQuizGeneratorClient). Removed redundant `IncompleteDetails` and refactored message handling. Updated dependency injection and constants for new clients like `ContentGeneratorClient`.

Add curriculum generation use cases and related tests
Introduce `GenerateCurriculumFromDescriptionUseCase` and `GenerateCurriculumFromFileUseCase` to support curriculum generation based on descriptions or files. Update `ContentGeneratorClient` to use `ContentType` enum instead of strings, and register `SyllabusSummarizerClient` in the DI module. Add comprehensive tests for new use cases and adjust existing client tests for compatibility.

Add use cases for generating modules, lessons, and sections
This commit introduces `GenerateModuleUseCase`, `GenerateLessonUseCase`, and `GenerateSectionUseCase` along with their respective tests. These classes enable content generation at various levels (modules, lessons, sections) using a shared `ContentGeneratorClient`. Dependency injection is updated for these use cases.

Remove AuthScreenTest to clean up redundant desktop tests.
AuthScreenTest and associated dependencies were deleted as part of cleanup, likely to streamline code and remove redundant test coverage. This change ensures the project's test suite is more focused and avoids duplication or unused files.

Remove unused classes and tests; update dependencies.
Deleted multiple unused classes and their corresponding tests, including `GenerateCurriculumFromFileUseCase`, `GoogleImageSearchClient`, and `ImageSearchClient`. Also removed related resources and configuration settings to streamline the codebase. Updated Kotlin compiler options and Gradle dependencies for maintainability and better alignment with project requirements.
Studying and Assessment

feat: add Path and PathBuilder classes for Firestore path management
- Introduced `Path` class to represent immutable Firestore paths with validation. - Added `PathBuilder` class to construct paths with collection and document segments. - Implemented methods for path validation, segment addition, and path building.

Remove index property from module, lesson, and section models.
This updates models, entities, DAOs, and related logic to use titles or IDs instead of index-based identification. The database version is incremented to maintain compatibility, and aligned test cases and composable UI logic accordingly.

Refactor models and adjust related logic for index removal
Removed index property from lesson, module, and section models, updating entities, DAOs, and business logic to rely on IDs or titles instead. Increased database version to maintain compatibility and aligned affected test cases and UI components accordingly.

refactor(composeApp): move all presentation files to a new directory
- Grouped component, dimension, layout, screen, and theme folders into a single directory for better organization.

Refactor: reorganize presentation layer directory structure
Moved all presentation-related files in the composeApp module to a new "presentation" directory for improved organization. Updated file paths and adjusted imports across affected components, screens, themes, and view models accordingly.

refactor: use resource folder for snackbar messages
- Updated code to fetch snackbar messages from the resource folder instead of hardcoding them. - Improved maintainability and localization support.

Refactor: use resource folder for snackbar messages
Replaced hardcoded snackbar messages with resources to improve maintainability and localization support. Adjusted dependencies and logic in relevant ViewModels, UseCases, and tests accordingly.

Refactor: improve Study and Dashboard view logic
Introduced `StudyAction` and `StudyUIState` and modified `StudyViewModel` and `StudyScreen` to enhance separation of concerns. Added `DashboardViewModel` and `DashboardScreen` implementations with corresponding unit tests to support dashboard functionality. Updated snackbar message handling to use external resource files for better localization and maintainability.
